newsitem.title: USA: i2 says merging with Optimax, Think Systems.
newsitem.headline: i2 says merging with Optimax, Think Systems.

text.p: i2 Technologies Inc said it has agreed to merge with Optimax Systems Corp and Think Systems Corp, in deals valued at about $52.2 million and about $146.6 million, respectively.
i2 said both deal values are based on the closing price of i2 Technologies common stock on May 15.
i2 said the Optimax deal involves the exchange of 1.373 million shares of i2 Technologies common stock for the outstanding shares and stock options of Optimax.
The company said the Think Sytems deal calls for it to issue 3.859 million shares of its common stock for all the outstanding shares and stock options of Think.
Both mergers are intended to qualify as a tax-free reorganization and be accounted for as a "pooling of interests."
